extendedInfo.description: Do you ever ask yourself how they made all this special effects in the Hollywood movies and in the special photo studios? The answer is simple, "blue screen" is the secret of this magic after that are involve expensive computers, alot digital work,big teams and many hours work. Until Now. Now you have the chance to do all this for no time and absolutely for free with Special Fx Camera. All you need to do is to download this free app, develop your fantasy and follow couple of ease steps. Step 1: Open the panel with the imported from us photo effects Step 2: Select the desired photo effect Step 3: Press button "Done" Step 4: Select the color picker from the tools menuStep 5: Point your camera and press the screen to select color for the effectStep 6: Set the tolerance from the sliderStep 7: Take picture and share it with your friends via Facebook, Skype, Picasa, Gmail, Twitter, Bluetooth, Viber, Flipboard, Google+, Quick Send, Wi-Fi Direct, NFC Tapping, Hangouts and more. With the real time camera image processing you will see the final result immediatelyYou can find  our Help tutorial,directing you Step By Step how to create your first picture with applied special effect.The Help button is located on the tools panelCompare with the rest real time camera applications in Special Fx Camera you ain't depend from the someone else creativity. You can integrate any pictures and turn them into special effect, this option is given you complete freedom of your creativity and fantasy. For example: Search in Google images for fire effect picture, save it on your phone open Special Fx Camera and from the Custom Fx panel just add the saved picture then choose it and applied.With special effect camera you can even tuning your car (see the screenshots for example)****** Video rewiew by GiveMeApps https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yKkL5jHVQlQ  ******For any questions please  feel free to contact uskeywords:Camera cam custom special effect real time preview movies photo studio image images picture Androidâ¢ color colors tools share blue green red screen magic fx tuning car

reviews.title: Looking good  but haven\'t really got a chance to work it.
reviews.comment: It seems to have the functions it claims but  I didn\'t get a chance to really test it yet. I\'m hoping and it looks promising. I will go with the paid for sure if it works as stated on the Galaxy Note 2.  A plus is, it\'s not full of permissions that aren\'t needed to run the app.
reviews.author: Leonardo Bjork

reviews.comment: You really need an actual green screen

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Wrote developer about adding in app purchase of .99 to remove ads or could they come out with an ad free pro version with more options.  Hope they can do one of them.  Cool app.  Update - thanks for reply dev - great news about pro version - looking forward to the release.  Update - Pro version is released - it has more spfx filters in it too. :-)
